content:
The current IG publisher fails downloading the FHIR 4.0.1 package: 

 [java] Installing hl7.fhir.r4.core#4.0.1 to the package cache
     [java]   Fetching:............................................................................................................
     [java]   .................................................................................|..............................................................................................
     [java]   Analysing................................Publishing Content Failed: /Users/patrickwerner/.fhir/packages/hl7.fhir.r4.core#4.0.1/package/other (Is a directory) (00:06.0288)
     [java]                                                                                  (00:06.0288)
     [java] Use -? to get command line help                                                  (00:06.0288)
     [java]                                                                                  (00:06.0288)
     [java] Stack Dump (for debugging):                                                      (00:06.0288)
     [java] java.io.FileNotFoundException: /Users/patrickwerner/.fhir/packages/hl7.fhir.r4.core#4.0.1/package/other (Is a directory)
     [java]     at java.base/java.io.FileInputStream.open0(Native Method)
     [java]     at java.base/java.io.FileInputStream.open(FileInputStream.java:219)
     [java]     at java.base/java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:157)
     [java]     at org.hl7.fhir.utilities.TextFile.fileToBytes(TextFile.java:227)
     [java]     at org.hl7.fhir.utilities.cache.PackageCacheManager.analysePackage(PackageCacheManager.java:191)
     [java]     at org.hl7.fhir.utilities.cache.PackageCacheManager.addPackageToCache(PackageCacheManager.java:571)
     [java]     at org.hl7.fhir.utilities.cache.PackageCacheManager.loadPackage(PackageCacheManager.java:627)
     [java]     at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.loadCorePackage(Publisher.java:2086)
     [java]     at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.initializeFromJson(Publisher.java:1710)
     [java]     at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.initialize(Publisher.java:1163)
     [java]     at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.execute(Publisher.java:650)
     [java]     at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.main(Publisher.java:6622)

BUILD FAILED
/Users/patrickwerner/IdeaProjects/genomics-reporting/framework/build.xml:161: Java returned: 1

if 4.0.1 is already present it works, but if the publisher has to d/l the package this is happening
(tested on a mac)
sigh. Caching meant that I missed a rather significant bug. I think I have it all sorted and a release is on it's way
